opportunities.title: Highway 101 Pavement Rehabilitation - District 4
opportunities.scopeSummary: The project involves cold plane removal of existing asphalt concrete pavement, placement of new asphalt concrete overlay, and traffic control on Highway 101 between Millbrae Avenue and Broadway in Burlingame. Work must be performed during nighttime hours to minimize traffic impact.

opportunities.title: Bridge Inspection Services - District 7
opportunities.scopeSummary: Provide comprehensive bridge inspection services for 25 structures in Los Angeles County. Services include visual inspection, documentation, condition assessment, and preparation of inspection reports in accordance with Caltrans Bridge Inspection Standards.

opportunities.title: Traffic Signal Upgrade - District 11
opportunities.scopeSummary: Upgrade existing traffic signal systems at five intersections along State Route 163. Work includes removal of existing equipment, installation of new LED signal heads, controller cabinets, vehicle detection systems, and integration with existing traffic management systems.
requirements: IMSA Level II Traffic Signal Technician certification

opportunities.title: Erosion Control and Landscaping - District 3
opportunities.scopeSummary: Install erosion control measures and native plant landscaping along Interstate 80 corridor in Placer County. Project includes installation of erosion control blankets, hydroseeding, planting of native species, and installation of irrigation system. All work must comply with environmental permits and specifications.

opportunities.title: Concrete Barrier Replacement - District 12
opportunities.scopeSummary: Remove and replace damaged concrete median barriers on Interstate 5 in Orange County. Work includes sawcutting, removal of existing barriers, placement of new Type 60 concrete barriers, and restoration of roadway surface. Traffic control and lane closures will be required.
requirements: Class A General Engineering Contractor License
